meta_title: Capital Expenditure Meaning: Industrial CapEx Guide
meta_description: Understand capital expenditure (CapEx) in industrial maintenance. Learn how to define, track, and justify long-term asset investments for better ROI.
title: What is Capital Expenditure (CapEx)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is Capital Expenditure (CapEx)?

image_prompt: A high-angle, wide-shot of a modern, clean industrial manufacturing floor in 2026. Maintenance managers in high-visibility vests and hard hats are reviewing data on a tablet next to a large, newly installed robotic assembly arm. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the scale of the capital investment. Photo-realistic, 8k resolution, no text.
